remarks: Replacing a nested consequent.  A sort of syllogism in antecedent position.  (Contributed by Wolf Lammen, 20-Sep-2013.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
wl-syls1.1 $e |- ( ps -> ch ) $.
wl-syls1.2 $e |- ( ( ph -> ch ) -> th ) $.
wl-syls1 $p |- ( ( ph -> ps ) -> th ) $.
